General.Name: Golden Eagle Retail Group Limited
General.Description: Golden Eagle Retail Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in development and operation of lifestyle center and department stores in the People's Republic of China. It operates through three segments: Retail Operations; Property Development and Hotel Operations; and Other Operations. The company is involved in the supermarkets and hotels operations; online trading; property holding; aquariums operation; cosmetic products trading; property development and investment; and education investment activities. It also offers communication and information services. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China. Golden Eagle Retail Group Limited is a subsidiary of Golden Eagle International Retail Group Limited.
